min3d.vos
Class Color4Managed

java.lang.Object
  min3d.vos.AbstractDirtyManaged
      min3d.vos.Color4Managed
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDirtyManaged
public class Color4Managed
extends AbstractDirtyManaged

Same functionality as Color4, but uses proper accessors to r,g,b, and a properties, rather than VO-style public variables, so that 'dirty flag' can be managed properly. It is also backed by a FloatBuffer.
